segments.text: Hello , may I speak to Mr.Baker , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hold on a second , please . I'll see if he's in . I'm sorry , Mr.Baker had just gone out . Who's calling ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is Jones . Can I leave a message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please tell him to call Mr.Baker at the Grand Restaurant . It's urgent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I'll have Mr.Baker call you as soon as he comes back .
segments.speaker: S2
